RumorFact.Text: Solanum is the last Nomai alive. What if I show them all I know with vision torch from the Damaged Laboratory on The Stranger?

ExploreFact.Text: After the vision something strange happened. The clouds disappeared immediately and I can now hear an unknown frequency coming from Solanum. There are bizarre looking sparks on their mask.
Solanum looks disoriented according to their reply.

RumorFact.RumorName: Solanum left some text near their body
RumorFact.Text: There are some new inscriptions left very recently

ExploreFact.Text: It must be very strange to see your own dead body. I'm not surprised Solanum that wants to leave this place as soon as possible. They took their recorder and asked me to find them somehow. Maybe I should start by searching Timber Hearth.
